name: INFINI (itch) (polyzen)
description:
INFINI

INFINI is an indie first-person Puzzle-horror game created by Polyzen Studio.

A man who is running away from the police enters a house that doesn't look normal! In 1990, the residents of the house were killed, but no one found the body of their little daughter, who was a piano player. It is rumored that the house is haunted by this girl...

Controls

WASD to move,E to interact,MOUSE to look around. SHIFT to run? NOPE! :)

Planning and Development

we are working hard to release the full  game in a few months. there are a lot of changes and improvements that our team working on.

your support and comments really help us :)
